text:
Haa, haa...
S-Sorry, Kogane, I'm late...!

First, take a deep breath~...!
Do you want some water~?

Ah, no, I'm fine.
Thanks, though.

Hoo... Sorry, Kogane...
I promised to watch the lesson with you.

That's okay~!
I nailed the lesson perfectly!

Yeah...
The phone call ended up being longer than I expected.

Phew~...
It must be tough even during the training camp~...

No, no,
I can't let the love bells get the best of me.

We talked about expanding overseas, remember?
That got me thinking...

Kogane...
You're aiming to leap into the wide world.

I felt like if I didn't follow your lead, I wouldn't be
doing enough, so I suddenly felt really motivated.

Is that so~...!
Hehe~... It's all thanks to me~...!

Yeah!
It must be Kogane's energy!

I've always been the one getting help, so I'd be
happy if I could be of help to you, Producer~...!
